description: Excite students interest in your company by inviting us to come see your offices. You can give a presentation about what your company is all about, put on mock interviews, give us a tour of the facility, or anything else. Last year, after hosting a field trip, a local company got several internship resumes and eventually got a summer intern because of the event.
